title: Python Feature: Logging + Config + HTTP
description: Adds config.json and a tiny requests-based HTTP sample with logging.

with.text:
import json
import logging

try:
    import requests
except Exception:
    requests = None

logging.basicConfig(level=logging.INFO)

def run():
    with open('config.json', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
        cfg = json.load(f)
    base = cfg.get('baseUrl', 'https://example.com')
    logging.info('GET %s/', base)
    if requests is None:
        logging.warning('requests not installed')
        return
    r = requests.get(base + '/')
    logging.info('Status: %s', r.status_code)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    run()
